description: Robert Downey Jr. and some friends dined at Yeah! Burger in West Midtown over the weekend.
title: Robert Downey Jr. spotted out and about in Atlanta
title_page: Robert Downey Jr. spotted out and about in Atlanta
text:
Robert Downey Jr. and some friends dined at Yeah! Burger in West Midtown over the weekend.
The actor in town to play Tony Stark/Iron Man in "Captain America: Civil War" enjoyed a bison burger on Sunday afternoon. Previously he dined at the Buckhead Diner and posed for this great photo.
CGBvH1-VIAEDAbH
"Cap 3," as it's known expeditiously among those who trade information 140 character at a time, has filmed in Buckhead, Midtown and downtown. Today the Marvel project has set up shop at a huge new auto plant south of the city, in between downtown and the airport.
